allowArray.description: If `false`, will report default export of an array

allowArrowFunction.description: If `false`, will report default export of an arrow function

allowCallExpression.description: If `false`, will report default export of a function call

allowAnonymousClass.description: If `false`, will report default export of an anonymous class

allowAnonymousFunction.description: If `false`, will report default export of an anonymous function

allowLiteral.description: If `false`, will report default export of a literal

allowObject.description: If `false`, will report default export of an object expression

allowNew.description: If `false`, will report default export of a class instantiation
